message: I'm mildly conflicted. not because I support a single thing KF has done. but I've also become invested in observing some of the dramas from afar that it translates to a slight feeling of loss. I can go elsewhere for more innocuous drama, but I've been following ChrisChan for so long that I'm going to be at least a tiny bit bummed. I dunno, I'm genuinely conflicted. @hasanabi
